trans-unit.source: In addition to automatically connecting clients to the primary replica, a listener can also be used to redirect read-only workloads to the secondaries.
trans-unit.target: In addition to automatically connecting clients to the primary replica, a listener can also be used to redirect read-only workloads to the secondaries.

trans-unit.source: This can improve the performance and scalability of your overall solution.
trans-unit.target: This can improve the performance and scalability of your overall solution.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <linkText>Use ReadIntent Routing with Azure AlwaysOn Availability Group Listener</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <linkText>Use ReadIntent Routing with Azure AlwaysOn Availability Group Listener</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: For other information about using SQL Server in Azure, see <linkText>SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For other information about using SQL Server in Azure, see <linkText>SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines</linkText><title></title>.
